ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Gaming Death
ygData.msgSnippet: My biggest pet peeve is when people come up to me and demand I sow them when I am in the middle of a battle.  Next time I get around to kunark,  I will be
ygData.messageBody:
My biggest pet peeve is when people come up to me and demand I sow them when I am in the middle of a battle.  Next time I get around to kunark,  I will be getting the spell Scale of wolf,  it is the upgrade to SOW,  but with a BIG drawback,  as soon as you cast another spell,  or enter combat the spell is gone (similar to invis)  SO,  next time some idiot demands a SOW from me, I'll gladly give them scale of wolf =D

Toni aka

<div style="color: rgb(133, 4, 240); font-size: 28pt; font-family: Palace Script MT">Katashaka Naboombu</div>  <BR> High Shaman<BR> Future Grandmaster Alchemist <br>Champions Of War <BR><a href="http://www.magelo.com/eq_view_profile.html?num=301439"> Magelo profile</a> <BR><a href="http://www.digitalmarble.com/toni/me.htm">me</a>

PS  this is the first time I've used my new sig,  so if It doesn't turn out, sorry =D

  bigmaca3 <bigmaca3@...> wrote:

I think I've gotten a Rez like twice in 2 years of playing!  Once was
from a Cleric who was PL'ing an Ogre War who sat down in the exit
from SolA, so nobody got out of there alive.  She Rezzed everyone and
started smacking him good! LOL

Death is just a part of the game.  Yeah, it sucks to die, especially
deep in a dungone or in the middle of the zone.  Luckily I can SoW,
buff myself to the max and RUN like mad.  It helps to know where you
are when you go down.

I think all Buffs, Rezzes, SoW and all of that are bestowed upon
people as a favor, not as a requirement just because you can.  I
get "Demands" for Sow and anything else.  A lot of people get ignored.
And I always make sure to have a few plat on me, for a port, a
clarity or a rez.  It's only right to at least offer.

Tul

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> Oh, I know that feeling. I get sooo many rez requests for my
cleric. I mean,
> I will get people who contact me when I am in GD and want me to rez
them in
> Guk. And I"m not even talking about guildies.. My guildies are
fairly nice
> about that. There have been maybe 2 people in guild (not counting
the ones
> related to me by blood) who annoyed me by wanting me to drop
everything to
> go either rez or powerlevel them. The rezzing doesn't bother me. I
did over
> 33 rezzes in 2 days. I received donations for 2 of them. But I felt
good
> having helped people. I generally only ask for a rez if I can't get
back to
> my own corpse to rez it-- or if I'm playing my bard or wizard.
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
> > In regards to death in game and such.  There was a time
> > when our highest level Cleric at the time was so
> > inundated with requests from  guildies to rez them
> > everytime they died.  It didn't matter that  there was a
> > cleric in the zone that was happy to do the rez, for a
> > small donation in most cases.  But the people that
> > either had not been smart enough to carry enough pp on
> > them or were just too cheap to donate for the rez were
> > mostly the ones to beg our cleric to rezz them.  Now our
> > cleric soon realized the pattern only after I had the
> > gumption to mention it to him after I got a rezz from
> > him, luckily he was only one zone over from where I had
> > died and he was getting ready to log for the night so I
> > managed to catch him when he wasn't busy.  Once I showed
> > him the pattern he learned to not drop everything he was
> > doing to rezz the poor soul and also checked to see if
> > there was a cleric nearby before he even went to rezz
> > the peep.  Unfortunately he got  one request too many
> > when he was working on his Epic and he got fed up and
> > left guild.  But the few of us who didn't bother him
> > constantly if he was not busy he will still do teh rez
> > for  us IF and only If we were not able to find one on
> > our own.
> >
> > But the rezzes really are  more of a priviledge than a
> > right in the game. At least that is the way I see it.  I
> > pretty much solo a lot onmy own atm when i am really not
> > wanting to hurry up and level.  this helps me learn the
> > zone I am in a little better and  I rarely ask for a
> > rezz unless I have lost a level or I am very close to
> > ding.  And if I must go to the guild for a rezz i make
> > sure I have exhausted all the other avenues before going
> > to teh guild to see if any of our rezzers are on.  Hell
> > I've even settled for a 35% on more occasion than I can
> > count  if that was the best i could get and was quite
> > happy with it. And i always make sure that I offer a
> > donation whether I have said I would donate or not.
> > Most times when I do get teh rezz I have had the
> > donation rejected only because I made the effort to fork
> > over the pp.
> >
> > Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
> > Halyburton Bearhugger 26 BarbShm
> > Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
> > Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
> > Oroblram 9 Hu War
> > Doktari 6 HIE Cleric
> > Defender of the Faith
> > Saryn
